page.title: 11COMMUNITY NEWSPAPER
page.content: 'Insight' is the area's own quarterly magazine containing information of interest to local residents. It has 15 pages full of pictures, articles and general information. The spring 85 edition contained a full page detailing the areas bus services and a 2-page spread on local wildlife and nature. The covers are designed by local people (often school-children) and there is also a page of information in Asian languages reflecting the multi-ethnic population. Community radio will be starting soon and 'Insight' is publicising and collecting resident's views on this. Important telephone numbers and adresses (eg. councillors, doctors, advice centres) are also included.
